channel.title: Easiest way to make a webclient V2
channel.description:
WARNING, what I never realised was that you MUST BUY the software to be able to put this on your website, if you don't want to buy it you cannot put it on the Internet and it will keep breaking. If someone has bought it please PM me your software key.
More pictures coming soon! (i am on linux)
FIRST, you want to download the bat to exe converter [url=http://download.cnet.com/Bat-To-Exe-Converter/3000-2069_4-10555897.html]here[/url], When you download that go open it and where it says "batch file" click the "..." button and select your "run.bat" then choose the "save as" location, and compile. Here is a mapout of what i mean. [img]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/5315/a1fabed00a0f8bea05d1469.jpg[/img]
Now go to the web game builder application, when you open it the starting point will look like this
[img]http://www.promotionsoft.com/web-game-builder/images/step1.gif[/img] , click next and where it says browse look for the folder your executable file is in and select it. [img]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/9615/step2n.gif[/img] then choose next. As a demonstration the site i am getting these pictures from is using a game file, we are using our client file. So when you come to this [img]http://www.promotionsoft.com/web-game-builder/images/step3.gif[/img] Choose your executable file from the folder and click next (ignore the gametrace thing, the site doesn't even exist) [img]http://www.promotionsoft.com/web-game-builder/images/step4.gif[/img] You can now customise the loading bar for the website page, then click next. [img]http://www.promotionsoft.com/web-game-builder/images/step5.gif[/img] Click build and when it's finished go to your output folder. Now when you are in your output folder, move EVERY SINGLE FILE into a new folder on your desktop (so it's easier to access for you newbies). Then go to your webhost, if you don't have a website already here are the hosts i recommend. t35.com, 000webhost.com, FREEWEBS IS THE WORST SITE YOU CAN POSSIBLY HOST THIS ON!
and when you upload all these files to your host you are done! so sit back and relax, and watch the magic happen. :)
REMEMBER THIS DOES NOT WORK UNLESS YOU BUY IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!11
I hope this was easy enough for you and that you got what you needed, if you have any errors after purchasing the software talk to me and i'll see what i can do. Buy at your own risk.

item.title: Easiest way to make a webclient V2
item.dc:creator: @sunnyman sunnyman
item.description:
@sunnyman wrote:

[quote=“gunz4life, post:13, topic:339842”][quote author=recker450 link=topic=436215.msg3289030#msg3289030 date=1280412744]
ric’s tut is free but it comes with a price
its difficult and come with errors
[/quote]
but whos gonna pay…however much it costs…for this? it would be awesome if someone payed the 40 bucks idk, but doubt anyone will.
Its easy and doesn’t come with errors unless you don’t know how to follow the tutorial or the tutorial doesn’t work with the client base you used, which client did you use?

whats the point of posting this if you know it doesnt work?

It does work if you buy the program.

[quote]
WARNING, what I never realised was that you MUST BUY the software to be able to put this on your website, if you don’t want to buy it you cannot put it on the Internet and it will keep breaking. If someone has bought it please PM me your software key.
[/quote][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Easiest way to make a webclient V2
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

WARNING, what I never realised was that you MUST BUY the software to be able to put this on your website, if you don’t want to buy it you cannot put it on the Internet and it will keep breaking. If someone has bought it please PM me your software key.

More pictures coming soon! (i am on linux)

FIRST, you want to download the bat to exe converter here, When you download that go open it and where it says “batch file” click the “…” button and select your “run.bat” then choose the “save as” location, and compile. Here is a mapout of what i mean.

Now go to the web game builder application, when you open it the starting point will look like this


, click next and where it says browse look for the folder your executable file is in and select it.

then choose next. As a demonstration the site i am getting these pictures from is using a game file, we are using our client file. So when you come to this

Choose your executable file from the folder and click next (ignore the gametrace thing, the site doesn’t even exist)

You can now customise the loading bar for the website page, then click next.

Click build and when it’s finished go to your output folder.
Now when you are in your output folder, move EVERY SINGLE FILE into a new folder on your desktop (so it’s easier to access for you newbies). Then go to your webhost, if you don’t have a website already here are the hosts i recommend. t35.com, 000webhost.com, FREEWEBS IS THE WORST SITE YOU CAN POSSIBLY HOST THIS ON!

and when you upload all these files to your host you are done! so sit back and relax, and watch the magic happen.

REMEMBER THIS DOES NOT WORK UNLESS YOU BUY IT!!!11

I hope this was easy enough for you and that you got what you needed, if you have any errors after purchasing the software talk to me and i’ll see what i can do. Buy at your own risk.
